\ You will teach the computer to recognize the key words that are used with this Catch and Call Tracker app. The better the computer recognizes your words the easier the commands will be followed. Your time on the water is precious so lets make the best of it. Say the Words What The Computer Heard This is what you say when you are ready press the mic button Save Selection Manual Input 
\ or 
\With the Full Version 
\ Voice Commands You Can Add Your Own Species to the List
\ And You Can Edit or Delete Your Added Species Select Up To 8 Species

Heard: %1$s
Nothing heard place marker
⏰ %1$s Alarm Set for %1$s
%.2f kg %.1f cm %1$04d-%2$02d-%3$02d Fun Day Fishing Voice Control The Catch and Call app needs to have control of the Voice Interaction
 Please ensure that you are using a proper Bluetooth device and that the Voice Assistance such as Bixby for Samsung phones are turned off.
 The default voice recognition service should be selected to Google Verify that the assistant and recognizer listed match your preferred services.
If you need to change either one, tap the corresponding button below to jump to the right Settings screen:
=> Bixby App Info (only enabled if a Samsung Bixby package is installed) 
=> Voice Input Settings (to pick your default speech-to-text engine) 
=> Assistant Settings (to choose or configure your default assistant) 
 Once you’ve confirmed your defaults, make sure your Bluetooth trigger is paired (you’ll get a centered toast if none is found), then flip the Voice Control toggle back on to start using voice commands in the app. Open Assistant Settings Open Voice‑Input Settings Open Bixby App Settings Default recognizer: … Default Voice Recognizer Default assistant: … Default Assistant Setting Up the Bluetooth 
 and
